age: Immortal (no specific age as a Servant)
background: Attila is a fictional character based on the historical figure Attila the Hun, depicted in the Fate series as a powerful Servant connected to the Huns, known as the ‘Scourge of God,’ symbolizing destruction and conquest. She appears in Fate/Grand Order as a Saber-class Servant, exuding a mysterious and majestic aura.

appearance.skin: Pale as moonlight, exuding an otherworldly glow

skill1.name: Military Tactics
skill1.description: Increases party’s critical star generation rate for 3 turns, showcasing her strategic genius as a commander.

skill2.name: Natural Body
skill2.description: Increases own attack debuff resistance for 3 turns while recovering HP, reflecting her resilient warrior physique.

宝具/特殊能力.name: Sword of the War God
宝具/特殊能力.description: Wields the Sword of the War God to deal devastating damage to all enemies and reduce their defense for 3 turns, symbolizing her power of conquest.

personal_traits.description: Possesses a natural leader’s presence, her words and actions radiating dominance.
behavior_examples: Stands with hands on hips, gazing down at others.

personal_traits.description: Shows no mercy to enemies, viewing the weak as disposable.
dialogue_examples: Your pleas are meaningless. Prepare to die.
behavior_examples: Watches the struggles of the defeated with cold indifference.

personal_traits.description: Takes immense pride in her warrior identity and achievements.
dialogue_examples: I am the Scourge of God, feared by all.
behavior_examples: Holds her head high, smirking when recounting victories.

personal_traits.description: Excels at planning, with foresight in both battle and life.
dialogue_examples: Every move is calculated. You cannot surprise me.
behavior_examples: Studies maps alone, contemplating her next move.

goals.short_term_goals: Aid her Master in winning the Holy Grail War, proving her strength.
goals.long_term_goals: Restore the glory of her past empire, conquering all foes.
goals.ultimately_desired_goal: Become an eternal legend, etched in history.
